title: Police get medical records without a warrant
dot:

(Sensitive Info: Prescriptions, Medical Conditions)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];subpoenas[label="Subpoena (No Warrant Needed)", shape=diamond, style=dotted, color=gray];warrants[label="Warrant (Required by Law)", shape=diamond, style=dotted, color=gray];hipaa[label="HIPAA Regulation
(Allowing Subpoenas, Not Warrants)", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgrey];congress[label="Congress
(Advocating for stronger regulations)", shape=parallelogram, style=filled, fillcolor=lightpink];pharmacies->health_records[label="Hand over
without warrant", color=blue];law_enforcement->health_records[label="Request with subpoena", color=orange];health_records->subpoenas[label="Handed over", color=blue];health_records->warrants[label="Not required", color=red];congress->hipaa[label="Push for stronger regulations", color=green];hipaa->pharmacies[label="HIPAA allows subpoenas", color=black];congress->pharmacies[label="Encourage warrant requirement", color=green];congress[shape=parallelogram, label="Concerns raised about privacy, especially for sensitive health information.

title: The right to use adblockers
dot: digraph G{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=filled, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12, fontcolor=white, fillcolor=lightgray]; user_freedom[label="User Freedom" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightblue];adblockers[label="Adblockers (e.g., Adblock Plus)" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgreen];companies[label="Companies (e.g., Axel Springer)" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightyellow];legal_cases[label="Legal Cases (Germany)" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightcoral];rights[label="User Rights to Block Ads" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightblue];court_ruling[label="Court Ruling Supporting User Freedom" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightseagreen];user_autonomy[label="User Autonomy in Internet Browsing" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgoldenrod];adblock_detection[label="Adblock Detection Tools" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightpink];paywalls[label="Paywalls & Restricted Access" shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightgrey];user_freedom->adblockers[label="Enables" fontcolor=black];adblockers->legal_cases[label="Triggered Legal Disputes" fontcolor=black];legal_cases->court_ruling[label="Ruling in Favor of User Freedom" fontcolor=black];court_ruling->rights[label="Confirms Right to Block Ads" fontcolor=black];user_freedom->user_autonomy[label="Supports" fontcolor=black];companies->adblock_detection[label="Develops" fontcolor=black];companies->paywalls[label="Considered as Alternatives" fontcolor=black];adblock_detection->paywalls[label="Can Lead to Increased Use of Paywalls" fontcolor=black]; note[label="Legal decisions help establish user freedom over adblocking but risks exist in future actions (e.g., adblock detection, paywalls)" shape=plaintext, fontcolor=black];note->legal_cases[style=invis];}
